CRANE The operator's hand slips off the lever, hitting a RED BUTTON. To his horror the crane DROPS ITS LOAD OF STEEL. He starts to run out of the way and crashes into the woman and stroller. ACROSS THE STREET 27. direction.raw_text: Thank you! Thank you for saving me and my baby! She hugs him with her free arm, weeping with joy.

direction.raw_text: Okay, we better...well, I hear these little guys smother easy. The reporters rush over and surround Hal and the mother.

STREET - DAY Hal turns the corner to see his bus pulling away from the stop.

direction.raw_text: Okay, okay. Let's get it together, man. He closes his eyes in an attempt to will back his sanity.

direction.raw_text: Well, not too fast I hope. As she passes him and turns the corner out of his view he catches ANOTHER NAKED WOMAN - an old disgusting one.

direction.raw_text: Yes, fast, fast! He turns away from her in horror only to see AN ENTIRE BLOCK OF NAKED PEOPLE going about their business. He rubs his eyes and looks down the street again. Everyone has returned to a clothed state.

direction.raw_text: . He relaxes a little until he looks down and notices that he's floating a foot off the ground.

direction.raw_text: I think I need to go home. INT. HAL'S APARTMENT - DAY Hal's front door CREAKS as it slowly opens, revealing Master Mind. He walks over to the bathroom and smiles to himself as he notices the giant hole in the floor.

direction.raw_text: Welcome to your second birth, Hal Stewart. Master Mind continues to survey the room. He stops to look over a "KARATE KID" POSTER on Hal's living room wall. He focuses on the majestic image of Pat Morita teaching a young Ralph Macchio to kick.

direction.raw_text: Instruction is very important in the formative years. Every hero needs a mentor, a father figure to look up to. He presses his special watch, causing his body to MORPH INTO THE SPITTING-IMAGE OF PAT MORITA.

direction.raw_text: A man will usually find that if he drinks from a bottle, eventually, the bottle drinks from him. Hal does a SPIT TAKE. In the corner a darkened figure stands.

direction.raw_text: What a minute...all that stuff you use to say to me when Uberman was alive - about me being the loyal queen by your side as you rule over Metro City. That wasn't just super villain rhetoric, was it? You actually meant it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My, someone has a rather high opinion of themselves. They stare at each other in silence, their glares locked in conflict.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you really think I would be with someone like you? This stings Master Mind to the bone. And after a brief contemplation, he reaches the only logical, painful conclusion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. With that, Master Mind exits into the night, leaving Roxanne with a baffled expression on her face. INT. ABANDONED METRO CITY LIBRARY    - NIGHT Master Mind enters in a huff. Da Vinci closes the door behind him as Plato notices his master's agitated state.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything alright, sir? Master Mind GRABS PLATO BY THE GROIN with his metal gauntlet causing Plato's eyes to bulge in pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine, why do you ask?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You...just...seem... Master Mind tightens his grip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...distracted. Master Mind releases him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just with business, my minion. Just with business. I've decided it is time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, we've created our hero, now it's time to give him a little motivation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do we do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To be simply good is not enough. A hero must be driven by an almost relentless desire to right a wrong that can never be corrected.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, he must lose someone near and dear to him - his father figure. Gentlemen, it's time for Operation Mentor Kill! EXT. SKY OVER METRO CITY - DAY Titan flies high over and through the city, under bridges, between buildings, etc. He's not really working, just enjoying himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. WOMAN'S APARTMENT - NIGHT A PRETTY WOMAN sits at her makeup table wearing nothing but her bra and panties. Through the reflection in her mirror we see a large window directly behind her. As she applies lipstick we see Titan fly quickly by in the background. After a moment he slowly slides back in view and begins ogling the girl. She sees him in the mirror and quickly covers herself with a robe. Titan tries to hide his face as he zooms off. MOMENTS LATER Titan looks down to see an APARTMENT BUILDING IN RUIN. Emergency lights flash around it as swarms of people run around in chaos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, what the hell happened down there? Wait a sec - He stops in mid-air as he comes to the striking realization.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: THAT'S MY APARTMENT!!! EXT. HAL'S APARTMENT BUILDING - DAY Titan lands in front of the rubble that was once his home. Reporters stand just beyond the police line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crap. From the wreckage crawls a dying Pat Morita.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: PAT! Titan goes and kneels beside Pat, holding him in his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm dying, kid. There is just one last lesson I have for you. It is the most important of all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Master Mind did this, you must avenge me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Master Mind? Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because he's evil. You must stop the evil Hal - stop the... Pat's body goes limp. The cameras begin to pop and flash around them. Titan gently lays Pat's body down and stands respectfully over him. The reporters rush over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tighten, Is this the work of Master Mind?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How will the death of your mentor affect your resolve?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was that Pat Morita? Titan walks up to one of the cameras.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This injustice will not go unpunished. Master Mind, if you can hear me, Tighten is coming for you. In the background we see Plato and Da Vinci, DRESSED AS PARAMEDICS, load pat's body onto a stretcher. PLATO ACCIDENTALLY DROPS HIS SIDE. As he bends down to pick it back up, Pat quickly slaps him, then goes back to playing dead. INT. ABANDONED METRO CITY LIBRARY   - NIGHT Master Mind and the boys prepare the fortress for Hal's revenge attack. Master Mind is as giddy as a schoolboy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, people, we don't have much time. Titan should be here any minute, so let's get the lead out. There is a GIANT MOUNTED DEATH RAY in the middle of the hall being tinkered with by Da Vinci.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's the death ray coming?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nearly up to full power, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hum. Let's turn it down a few notches. It's his first time and we don't want to get in a lucky shot, now do we? Plato enters the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything on the radar yet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see. Well, he must be planning something big. Are the flame androids deployed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All twelve. Master Mind rubs his hands in anticipation as he sits down on his throne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wonderful, wonderful. Plato, Da Vinci, take your places next to me. They move to either side of the chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No slouching. Da Vinci straightens up and sucks in his gut. They remain this way for several long moments. Master Mind occasionally glances at a DIGITAL CLOCK on the wall. Still no Titan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LATER Apparently quite some time has passed. The bold stances have degraded to fatigue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's certainly taking his time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll be here. That's the way it works. STILL LATER Master Mind reclines in his chair and taps his metal gauntlet impatiently on the armrest. Plato has squatted down, resting his chin on his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unprofessional, that's what this is. No, it's disrespect for the craft. Master Mind rises and begins to pace back and forth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would Uberman have kept us waiting like this? Of course not. He was a pro who knew the score. It's time we spelled out a few things for this Titan. I will not be made a fool of. He storms out of the room. INT. HAL'S NEW APARTMENT - DAY Titan's sitting on the floor in a barren apartment wearing his costume top and some tighty whities. He sips his beer as he watches a basketball game on a tiny TV. Much to his annoyance, there's a KNOCK at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, for crying out loud. He gets up and opens the door. It's Master Mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know who I am?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . It takes a few moments to register, but Titan's suddenly excited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, you're Master Mind. Yeah! You're actually the guy I want to see!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, so NOW you want to get down to it. Well, I want to get a few things off my chest first. Master Mind walks past Titan into the apartment. He spins around, pointing at him accusingly with one of his metal fingers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of all the inconsiderate - Do you have any idea how long we waited for you? We're you even planning on coming to me and getting revenge? Titan shuts the apartment door, and turns back toward his guest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, at first I was going to. You know, because that's what I figured I was supposed to do. But then I got to thinking-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: -You got to thinking? There's nothing to think about. I'm the villain. I do something bad, you come and get me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - I got to thinking...what's the point? Master Mind throws up his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you're right. What's the point? He suddenly notices something in the corner of his eye. He walks over to a futon in the living room. On top of it is a LARGE SACK OVERFLOWING WITH GOLD WATCHES,RINGS AND OTHER VALUABLES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are these?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I wanted to talk to you about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you get all this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get this: I stole them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From all over. You see, once you killed Pat and ruined my other apartment building I was pretty pissed off, so I figured I'd go, find you and kick some ass. Then I thought to myself: "Okay,then what?" I mean, if we were to fight, what would I get out of it? Would I get my apartment back? Would I be able to pay the bills?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what about your mentor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell you the truth? He was kind of a dick. I mean, being a hero is dandy and all, but it's volunteer work. Now you've always had the right take on all this. I mean, when you rob a bank or take over the diamond exchange you get something out of it. I mean, when you don't get caught, which, no offense, isn't very often. And that brings me to what I wanted to propose to you: Who could catch you if I'm by your side? Perplexed by his proposal, Master Mind just stares at Titan awe-struck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to team-up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got the brains, I got the brawn. We could even call ourselves that: `Brain' and `Brawn'. Look at this. Titan picks up a piece of POSTER BOARD off the floor and shows it to Master Mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I even designed us some new costumes. The picture is crudely drawn with magic markers and crayons. A big headed man (Master Mind) is standing on a plate of grass in a blue costume with a picture of a brain on his chest. Next to him, is a picture of Titan in a red costume with a black cape, but his chest is mysteriously blank. Titan proudly points to the two figures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See, you'd be brain, so you got a little one on your costume, and then I'll have brawn on mine...once I figure out the best, you know, visual interpretation of it. What do you think?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do I think? Master Mind shakes his head tiredly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you're probably the biggest idiot I've ever met. I mean, I can't believe you. All your gifts, all your powers, and all you want to use them for is your own financial fulfillment. You know what? Your kind of people make me sick. Titan puts down his drawing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I worked hard on this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh - gee - I am so sorry!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Master Mind looks to Heaven in disgust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of all the people to pick, it had to be this loser. This strikes a cord with Titan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, hold on. You're going a little too far.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish your mother said that to your father the night of your conception, they would have saved me a whole lot of heartache.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I mean it. Master Mind gets right in his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah? What are you gonna do? EXT. HAL'S APARTMENT BUILDING - DAY We see Master Mind's body CRASH through the building and land in a DUMPSTER across the street. A car pulls up. The driver's door opens. Da Vinci gets out and runs to help his master.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Master!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It hurts. Da Vinci peeks into the dumpster to see Master Mind's body cushioned by a stack of trash bags.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What hurts?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It! The overly large henchmen starts to pull his master from the dumpster when they suddenly hear a voice from above. It's Titan peeking through the hole in his apartment wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't need you, I don't need anybody. I have the power to do and take anything I want. And now, I'm gonna take back everything this city owes me. Beware Metro City, it's time for Titan to collect. Titan shoots up into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, and from now on - I'M GONNA FLY THE WAY I WANT TO FLY! He takes a sitting position and flies away as if he were piloting an invisible jet. Master Mind climbs out of the dumpster and watches Titan disappear into the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd the plan go, boss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just made myself redundant, old friend. Da Vinci gives Master Mind a whiff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not that bad. INT. BANK - DAY Titan, with a happy bounce in his step, enters the bank. The last time he was here he thwarted a robbery. He looks nostalgic. A SECURITY GUARD shyly walks up to him like a kid meeting his TV idol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Morning, Tighten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there something we can do for you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, don't bother about me. I'm just here to make a withdrawal. Titan walks across the lobby, drawing stares of admiration from all. A little girl waves to him sweetly. He gives her a good- natured WINK as he heads straight for the vault. The security guard watches him enter and come out with a SACK OF CASH. Sure he must be misunderstanding what's going on, the security guard just stares at Titan as he passes by and out the door. The bank manager comes over to the guard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say, did he just rob us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not sure. Sort of looks it, don't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should I, you know, stop him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Umm...Yeah. As the security guard exits the bank, the manager stares out the window. His eyes suddenly grow wide with terror. The guard's body suddenly smashes through the window, landing at the startled bank manager's feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He did rob us, didn't he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : TELEVISION "A Channel 7 News Special Report." Brad Helms wipes into view. 81.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Absolute power corrupts absolutely." When Lord Acton stated that, in a letter to Bishop Mandell Creighton in 1887, no one thought much about it, but today Metro City is reeling from that very prophecy. Tighten, who many thought of as our savior, has turned his back on the cause of justice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: TITAN BEING EVIL - MONTAGE EXT. DIAMOND EXCHANGE - DAY Titan flies through the window of the building. He emerges seconds later laughing with his shirt full of booty. EXT. CITY STREET - DAY A woman screams from the window of a BURNING BUILDING. Titan flies up to her, grabs her fur coat and zooms off again, leaving the woman behind, slightly confused. EXT. OUTSIDE MARKET - DAY Titan steals a little boy's lollipop and gooses his mother. EXT. CITY STREET - DAY Dozens of people run through the streets apparently to get out of a downpour. We cut to the top of a building and see Titan ZIPPING UP HIS PANTS and laughing. INT. ABANDONED METRO CITY LIBRARY   - NIGHT Master Mind paces back and forth in front of Plato and Da Vinci.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand it. He seemed to have every characteristic we were looking for in a superhero.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, there's no use crying about it now, we must take action. I'm not going to play second fiddle to that crass buffoon. We must destroy Tighten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It won't be easy. Uberman had a sense of decency and genuine love for the people. That was his weakness and was easily used against him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, but he possesses the same flaws present in Uberman's DNA - copper. It's like Benjamin Franklin always said: "If something works don't dick with it." EXT. BAR - DAY It looks like a war zone passed through here. Smashed police cars and debris lay everywhere. This seems to be the only building left untouched. INT. BAR - DAY A very tipsy Titan is sitting at the bar, looking deep into the bottom of his beer glass for answers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can have anything I want. I'm like a god. The BARTENDER just listens as he wipes down a glass with a dirty rag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Point to any woman in this bar. I could have her in a second. He follows the bartender's gaze to THE ONLY OTHER PERSON THERE - A passed out, MIDDLE AGED HAG OF A BARFLY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you wanna get with this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Buddy, what do you want? Titan carefully considers this for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want? That's the question, isn't it. I mean, what do you want when you can have everything? (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I suppose what I really want is to never be forgotten again. I want to do something that can never be cast aside or one-upped. I want a - what's it called? - A legacy. I want a legacy. Yeah, that's it. I like the sound that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I meant, what do you want to drink?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. EXT. BAR - LATER Titan stumbles out of the bar, carrying a large sack of money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your time has come to an end, Titan! He looks up to see Master Mind suddenly standing before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There can be only one master criminal in this city - and it's me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? Titan melodramatically throws up his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess I should leave town then, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a better idea - NOW! Two floors up Da Vinci releases a rope. A COPPER CAGE, like the one that caged Uberman, drops down on top of Titan. Titan nonchalantly surveys the cage. He walks to the bars, tries to pull them apart but can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's copper my good man. Your one weakness. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For all your amazing gifts of brawn you are no match for my intellect. Titan thinks for a moment. Suddenly, he starts to SPIN like a human top, DRILLING HIMSELF INTO THE STREET BELOW. As he disappears beneath the surface, we see a shocked look on Master Mind's face until Titan suddenly explodes out from under the street in front of him. Master Mind stares up at him, dumbfounded. Titan makes like he's going to strike him down, but stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what? You're nothing but a bug. Not even worth my effort. He turns his back to Master Mind and continues down the street. Plato makes his way from the shadows to join his master. They watch Titan shrink into the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not as dumb as I thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess not...Funny, though.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's funny?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Funny Uberman didn't think of the same thing. EXT. HIGH ABOVE METRO CITY - DAY As Titan flies, he looks down at the rooftops of the city below. Suddenly, something catches his attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it! He stops, hovering in place as he looks down below. The buildings, which make up the heart of downtown Metro, are in a PERFECT TRIANGLE with a long strip of street leading up to it. It sorta looks like a bowling lane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Legacy. EXT. KINGPIN BOWLING - DAY Vinnie and his goons come running out as the hear a COMMOTION. They look up to see Titan ripping off THE GIANT BOWLING BALL from the top of the establishment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, that's my ball! INT. ROXANNE'S APARTMENT BUILDING - DAY Roxanne enters the building's elevator. Just before the door closes an ELDERLY WOMAN slides in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was a close one. Sixth floor, please. Roxanne smiles and goes to press the button. The elderly woman suddenly pulls out a SPRAY CAN, shooting a MYSTERIOUS-LOOKING MIST into Roxanne's face. She falls to the floor unconscious. INT. ROXANNE'S APARTMENT - DAY Roxanne awakens, finding herself tied to a chair in her living room. We hear NOISE from a TV in the background as she tries to adjust her vision. Slowly, the blurry figure before her becomes clear. It's Master Mind. He sits on her Lazy-Boy, reading what looks to be some kind of JOURNAL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow, I always thought Uberman was your first superhero - but it looks like our little Roxanne dated a linebacker in college.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's my diary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's personal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, then I wouldn't leave it in your underwear drawer for just anyone to find. He throws the diary over his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need your help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you knock me out and tie me to a chair?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not going to like what I'm about to tell you. As she tries to shake off her headache from being knocked unconscious, Roxanne spots something on the TV. ON TELEVISION Brad Helms is huddled behind a van.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's chaos here in city square as city police - Behind him, Titan picks up a POLICE CAR and throws it at a PADDY WAGON. Both vehicles EXPLODE on impact. BACK TO SCENE ROXANNE He's really out of control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me about it. As if finally realizing something, Roxanne looks back at Master Mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I should have known. You have something to do with this, don't you? - With Titan turning evil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, the evil thing he did by himself. My goal was to give MYSELF purpose by creating an intellectual sparring partner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're talking like you made him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And they call me Master Mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me get this straight. You missed getting your ass kicked, so you made a new guy to kick your ass. That's pathetic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In hindsight... Roxanne turns back to the TV to see a group of POLICE OFFICERS open fire on Titan. The bullets just deflect off his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And his powers, they're just like Uberman's. Why would he have his powers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had some left over from something. I infused him with it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !? Driven by rage, she struggles to tear out of her bonds. She finally relents, giving Master Mind a look fueled by pure hatred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, that's why I decided to tie you up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did all this because you wanted purpose?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He seemed nice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TELEVISION Titan is standing on top of a destroyed police car. He waves for the camera to zoom in on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Closer. I want to show the people my real face. He pulls off his mask, revealing himself as Hal Stewart to the public for the first time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Recognize me? BACK TO SCENE ROXANNE Hal Stewart. He's the guy we thought saved that woman and kid. Turned out he was just trying to save his own ass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, good to know - NOW! TELEVISION Titan throws the mask over this shoulder and hops off the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right, I'm really Hal Stewart. Former hero and bowling teacher at Kingpin's Bowling. BACK TO SCENE Roxanne turns to Master Mind, condescending him with her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You picked a bowler to give super powers to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a modest profession! TELEVISION 89.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With my new found power, I've recently started to wonder what sort of legacy I should leave. Should I be a hero? I tried that once before - even saved a lady and her baby from being squashed. I was treated like a god until everyone started to shit on me - Okay, so what if I didn't "purposely" save them! He walks over and puts his hand on a large circular concrete shape just off camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm going to make something that can't be taken away from me. I'm going to create a permanent monument to my greatness. One that won't be so easily forgotten or erased. The camera pulls back revealing THE GIANT CONCRETE BOWLING BALL from Kingpin's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I intend to create a new category in the Guinness Book of World's Records by rolling the biggest strike in the history of bowling. He grabs the camera and points it to the DOWNTOWN BUILDINGS. We realize they are PERFECTLY ALIGNED IN BOWLING PIN FORMATION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My thanks to the city planning commission. This wouldn't have been possible without them. Titan grabs the camera so it's pointing back at him again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell your friends and family to tune in right here to this station at noon tomorrow. BACK TO SCENE ROXANNE My god, he's nuts. That'll destroy the whole business triangle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Master Mind seems to be contemplating something - something bad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My lair is in the direct path of the ball.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, real nice. Wouldn't want anything to happen to your hideout, would we?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't understand. I have certain equipment that's - that's highly unstable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I sort of have a hydrogen reactor, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reactor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's experimental - only one in the world...Well, how do you think I power all my inventions? Someone like me can't pay for electricity. The bills would be outrageous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It creates 100 times the output of a nuclear one...If destroyed it could...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Vaporize the entire city!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pshaw...the whole eastern seaboard, actually. That little baby is amazing. I'm quite proud of it. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean...we'd better find a way to stop him. Master Mind thinks a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did Uberman have a hideout?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A cave, a solitary fortress of some kind. C'mon, all heros have a place to hang their capes up in. Roxanne, it may be our only chance to find something, a clue, anything that could give us a fighting chance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's under his house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whose house? Roxanne can hardly believe what she's telling him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne Scott's. Master Mind shoots up out of his chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne Scott? Uberman was Wayne Scott!? Wayne Scott, the wealthy philanthropist? But he disappeared -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He disappeared just over two months ago when you killed him. Not only did you rid the world of a hero, you killed a kind, noble, generous man. Perhaps ashamed, the super villain hangs his head. Master Mind walks behind Roxanne and undoes her bonds. Rubbing her wrists, she watches him as he walks over to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like you got what you always wanted. Uberman is out of the picture and Metro City is doomed. He grabs the door knob and stops, considering her words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Metro City doomed." You know, I never thought I'd say something like this, but here it goes - He slowly turns to her, CUE HEROIC MUSIC.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not if I have anything to say about it. EXT. WAYNE SCOTT'S MANSION - NIGHT Master Mind stands before the huge, Gothic structure in awe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Such a dark place for one such as you. I wonder, underneath your noble deeds, what inner demons drove you to your endless crusade for justice? He walks to the front entrance. The double doors have been sealed shut with boards and nails. Master Mind begins to tear them off with his metal hand. INT. WAYNE SCOTT'S MANSION - NIGHT The doors opens. A beam of moonlight immediately pierces the darkness, forming an illuminated path into the heart of the manor. Master Mind enters. Covered in dust and cobwebs, the hall looks like a gigantic crypt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good lord, man. You've only been dead for two months. Master Mind walks, coming to a gigantic painted PORTRAIT OF WAYNE SCOTT. He stops to reverently admire the image of his fallen foe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A disguise so simple, it's ingenious. No wonder I never caught on. Besides the Armani suit, there's nothing to hide the fact that this is the same person as Uberman. In the picture, he's even standing in the same cheesy, heroic pose with his fists on his hips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two lives, yet in both you were an ideal. Perhaps it was you who was victorious in the end, old friend. A BONGING sound suddenly bellows through the dark halls. Master Mind comes to a grandfather clock standing next to a gigantic BOOKCASE. On the twelfth bong it falls silent. Master Mind begins to slide it across the floor until he hears a loud CLICK. The bookcase slides into the wall, REVEALING A HIDDEN PASSAGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll miss how predictable you were. The passage way leads Master Mind to a WORKING ESCALATOR. Master Mind gets off the escalator to see a long hallway with stone walls. He begins to hear strange SOUNDS, almost like MUFFLED SCREAMS, coming from a doorway at the end of the hallway. Master Mind starts walking towards it. As he steps closer, he begins to notice a light cracking through the bottom of the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello? Anyone here...besides..all the BIG MEN who are with me now? Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the worst you're gonna find? (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The man was a boy scout, not a serial killer. He opens the door to his immediate amazement. It's some kind of screening room. A PROJECTOR shoots an image onto A DIRTY WHITE SCREEN hanging on the wall. BEER CANS litter the floor; a table in front of a ripped-up couch is covered in discarded snack goods; and a Kiss Pinball machine stands in the far corner next to a CLOSED DOOR. Master Mind turns his attention to the action on the screen. SCREEN A woman dressed in a leather DOMINATRIX OUTFIT is whipping an overweight man lying on a swing-like device with his butt sticking out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! She whips him three times. The man CRIES out in pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! PINEAPPLE!!! Master Mind's eyes are transfixed on the disturbing imagery. The door by the pinball machine suddenly swings open. WAYNE SCOTT, dressed in raggedy sweats, steps into the room carrying a CAN OF BEER and a bowl of JIFFY-POP. Master Mind cannot believe his horrified eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhhhhh! Wayne Scott is just as startled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus! He drop his drink and snack to the floor. The two men stare at each other as they struggle to regain their normal breathing patterns. Wayne Scott walks over to the couch, brushes off a thick layer of chip crumbs, and sits down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I might just ask you the same question. I had thought I incinerated you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You scared the bejesus out of me. How'd you figure out I was still alive? Wait, how do you know my identity!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roxanne told me. As for your ruse, I forgot to line the bottom of the copper cage - Somebody pointed that out to me recently. Figured if they could do it, so could you. But one thing I couldn't figure out -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The skeleton? Something I "borrowed" from a medical school a few months before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A few months? How long had you been planning this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I always planned to retire - eventually. I mean, come on, you can't do this sort of thing in your fifties. You'd just look ridiculous. The pieces of the puzzle appear to be coming together in Master Mind's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see it all so clearly now. INT. MASTER MIND'S HYDROFOIL - FLASHBACK Master Mind and his minions cover their eyes as the observatory explodes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must have done it just seconds before the observatory exploded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. OBSERVATORY - FLASHBACK Similar to what Titan did, Uberman bores out from under the cage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bore out from under the cage. Then, using your Uber-Speed, - EXT. OBSERVATORY - FLASHBACK Running in a blur-like haze, Uberman screeches to a halt in front of some bushes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - you made your way to safety, where you had the skeleton safely hidden away somewhere. EXT OBSERVATORY - SKY - DAY Uberman soars high above the clouds. He looks down at the observatory, which is a mere speck in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you must have flown to a safe distance and waited for the explosion, then... Just as the observatory explodes Uberman aims and throws the SKELETON like a javelin. It soars through the air like a missile, tearing through the flames of the explosion, and crashing right into the windshield of Master Mind's hydrofoil. END OF FLASHBACK Wayne stares at Master Mind, clearly impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, you ARE smart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But why fake your death? Why go through all of it? You could have just quit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the responsibility would still be there. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A cop can retire and stop handing out speeding tickets - but people expect more from superheroes. I tell you, a volcano couldn't erupt in Zimbabwe without everyone expecting me to do something about it. I figured, out of sight, out of mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Wayne Scott? Why did he have to disappear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Both of my lives have so much baggage. It's time for new baggage, you know? Master Mind's is absolutely flabbergasted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just can't believe it. This whole time you've been in hiding while a force of great evil is tearing your city apart? Wayne rises to his feet, waving his hands for Master Mind to say no more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to hear about it. That's why I don't have a television in here to remind me of all the things I SHOULD be doing. Hell, I could get a wife to do that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a demented supervillain out there about to destroy our - I mean, your city. Wayne shrugs indifferently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're really going to do nothing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good and evil have a way of balancing themselves out. If this guy is as bad as you say, somebody will rise up to fight him. It's just the order of things. You found me, didn't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Wayne puts a condescending hand on Master Mind's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know it's hard, but you'll find someone else someday. He then starts walking to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're the only one who can stop him. Wayne turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Couldn't if I wanted to. Gotta a plane to catch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A plane?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Going to Barbados for a little change in climate. Now, if you'll excuse me, I got to go pack. He reads the still defeated look on Master Mind's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were a good foe. I'm sorry if I've let you down. If it makes a difference, you were the best foe a hero could ask for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not smart enough to come up with a full-proof trap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you did almost have me when you figured out my weakness was copper. Now that made me sweat a little. Took me way too long to drill out from under that cage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got lucky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway, it's a good thing for my sake that I could always count on you for an out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, we always threw each other a couple of bones. You would always leave me an out in one of your `full-proof' traps, and I'd never had you incarcerated at a penitentiary that you couldn't eventually escape from. It kept our little game going. Master Mind seems deflated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Game? - Was that all this ever was to you? You know, I was trying my best every time I fought you. Those `outs' as you call them were unintentional.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess I was never really a match for you, was I? Wayne shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then how can I expect to be one for Titan? A beaten man, Master Mind heads for the door, but stops and turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about Roxanne? Wayne unleashes an exhausted sigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we both got what we wanted out of our relationship. She got a career out of me, and I got plenty of other things out of her. But I'm ready to move on to greener pastures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Master Mind's steel hand clinches into a fist at his side. Wayne's oblivious to this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess I wasn't the villain I thought I was, and you...you weren't the hero I thought you were. He turns to make his exit when he suddenly sees ROXANNE STANDING IN THE DOOR FRAME. Wayne is almost at a loss for words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roxanne! How long have you been...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Long enough. Roxanne looks at Master Mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you have something else you can go do? Master Mind leaves Roxanne and Wayne facing each other in silence. EXT. ANOTHER BAR - DAY Titan emerges with Brad and Frank. He's holding a BEER CAN and a bag of PORK RINDS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, I want this whole thing to look ESPN professional, understand? A distant MECHANIZED RUMBLE can be heard. The noise rises, signaling the approach of something powerful. Titan and his crew walk out to the center of the plaza as the sound becomes almost deafening. A TANK TRACK as it moves over the street. We PULL BACK to see a whole line of TANKS rolling along the street. PLAZA From the five streets branching off the plaza, a dozen tanks roll toward Titan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Titan turns to Brad and Frank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You guys are about to get some good footage. I might need a little room, though. Brad and Frank look at each other and run to take cover behind a nearby building. Meanwhile, Titan nonchalantly sips from his beer as the tanks begin to surround them. FEEDBACK belts out of one of the tank's loudspeaker's, causing Titan to do a mock wince.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Titan, we have orders from the city of Metro to take you into custody. If you do not give your self up willingly, we will be forced to open fire. There's a long pause as no one says anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is your answer? Titan takes a sip of his beverage and UNLEASHES A GIGANTIC BURP - The shockwave of which sends several of the tanks flying into a nearby building. Two of the remaining tanks close in on the villain. Both have him dead to rights at point-blank range with their massive guns. Titan sets down his beer, then calmly plugs a fist into each barrel. They FIRE. The FORCE OF THE BLAST SENDS THEM BOTH FLYING IN OPPOSITE DIRECTIONS where they CRASH into nearby buildings. Titan bends down and pick his beet back up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miss me? Titan is suddenly bombarded by a massive barrage of machine- gun fire. The force sends him flying into the windshield of a nearby car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He looks up to see an APACHE ASSAULT COPTER. It's nose- mounted GATLING-GUN is turning toward him. Titan gets up to his feet and looks down at his beer can. The bottom of it was blown apart in the blast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't mean to get you involved in all of this. He stared daggers up at the helicopter pilot just as the gun gets a bead on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, man! You killed my suds! Titan throws the can up and slaps it with the palm of his hand. It flies with so much force it knocks the helicopter blade clean off. The rest of the Apache crashes to the street like a car dropped off a building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's one was for you, beer. Titan salutes the wreckage and walks away to find Brad and Frank still hiding behind the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guys, please tell me you got that last bit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're kidding me. I give you my sexiest moves and you mean to tell me it was for nothing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were afraid something might hit us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like I've given the story of the century to the wrong man. He thinks about this for a moment, then it hits him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. What about that other reporter. Blond. Not so lumpy on the topper half, but killer legs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roxanne. You want Roxanne. She's a much better reporter than I am. You want her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where can I find her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're actually not supposed to give out that sort of information.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mockingbird Lane. I believe she lives in a penthouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've been very helpful. He tosses Brad over his shoulder like a discarded ice cream cone. In the faint distance we see him splash down in the middle of the Metro City river. INT. ABANDONED METRO CITY LIBRARY   - DAY Master Mind, pacing anxiously as Plato and Da Vinci pack boxes. Obviously Master Mind is going on the lamb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry, we must be on our way as soon as possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Master, why must we flee?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you, Titan is too powerful. If he's set on destroying us, there's precious little we could do about it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are we going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To another city, someplace with a shitload of superheroes to fight. We'll start over, we'll go back to doing what we do best.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With our tails between our legs? The old Master Mind would never have let this comment slip by, but as we have seen, he's not the same man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plato, do you have a better plan?! Master Mind's cell phone rings. He turns in shame from his men and answers it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello...Roxanne? INT. ROXANNE'S APARTMENT Roxanne paces back and forth on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you going to do about Tighten? INTERCUT between Master Mind and Roxanne on phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right now I'm packing, later I'll have a snack on the train.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're running away?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In a word - yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You created this monster...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't create this - the god's of irony did and I am eating the crow I so richly deserve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no time for self pity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll make the time. Roxanne can't believe what she's hearing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can leave with us. You'll be safe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not going anywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you listen to me, no one can stop him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to try. The city needs your help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid you have an inflated opinion of me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell's happened to you? The Master Mind I knew would never have run from a fight even though he knew deep in his heart that he didn't have a chance in hell of winning it. It was your best quality. You need to be that man right now...I...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I believe in you. Master Mind is taken aback, in a good way. But he catches himself before the words swell his heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweet words, but that man is dead. Please, Roxanne, just come with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...I guess you are a coward after all. Suddenly, there's a loud crash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Roxanne looks up to see a huge hunk of her ceiling has been completely ripped off. Titan is flying above, holding the debris as casually as if it were a paper plate at a barbecue. He looks down at her and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, have I got a story for you. Master Mind can hears Titan's familiar laugh from his side of the line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roxanne? Roxanne? EXT. KINGPIN BOWLING - DAY Titan is standing in front of the bowling alley, trying to decide on an appropriate pose for the occasion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What pose would be best? The corny folded arms thing? He demonstrates, arching his chin proudly in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or maybe on the hips, like this. It's the classic Superman pose, only not as masculine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, makes me look like a flamer pirate. As Titan starts to fix his hair in the window, Frank pretends to fix the lens on his camera as he speaks to Roxanne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shouldn't we be making a run for it right about now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The guy can outrun bullets. I don't think either one of us is in that kind of shape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's right, Frank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Frank looks up, stunned that Titan could have possibly heard him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Also got super hearing. I promise not to keep the both of you long, but you'll thank me when this is all over. Frank and Roxanne exchange helpless expressions. INT. ABANDONED METRO CITY LIBRARY   - DAY Master Mind reverently stares up at the painted portrait of his father.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, it's me... (he looks around to make sure no one can hear) ...Bubsy. I know we haven't talked in a while, and I'm sorry. It's been a little crazy trying to live up to a legacy. The painting's menacing stare seems to reach into his very soul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway...You raised me to be the worst that I could possibly be. And I've tried to live up to that as best as I could - even dropping out of dentistry school like you wanted me to. But I'm about to do something now that would really piss you off. I'm going to go against everything you ever taught me. I hope...I hope that maybe you'll look down at what I'm about to do as not so much a good deed, but more like the outright defiance of a hateful and ungrateful, son. If you could do that, then maybe - in your own little way - you could - for probably the first time - find a reason to be proud of me. He looks back up at the picture. Is it our imagination, or does the painting's stare suddenly seem even angrier?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...either way, you're probably going to see me real soon. (calling over his shoulder) Men? Plato and Da Vinci suddenly stop what they're doing and look up at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes Sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop packing. Our work is not finished here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! TELEVISION A news report shows an aerial shot of Titan setting the giant ball down in the middle of a vacant city street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We interrupt your regular afternoon programming to show you live footage of a potential dangerous situation in downtown Metro. The former hero knows as Titan is placing what appears to be a giant ball... INT. ABANDONED METRO CITY LIBRARY     - CONTINUOUS Da Vinci stops in front of a television set, seeing the news report in progress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on...It appears our own Roxanne Ritchi is somehow at the scene. We now go to her with a live report.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, I think you should see this!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 109. EXT. CITY STREET - DAY Roxanne is standing in front of a camera with a mike in her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm here with the cause of the destruction in Metro City. He has kidnapped me and a cameraman to chronicle what he refers to as the creation of a monument to his invincibility and overall "Asskickiness." He will use this giant concrete bowling ball to play the largest game of bowling ever using the buildings of downtown Metro City as his pins. Titan suddenly steps into the shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I'm going for the biggest strike ever. He leans into the camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you, Metro City, have a ringside seat as I cement my name in the anal of history.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Annals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nevermind. EXT. CITY STREET - MOMENTS LATER Titan holds up the massive bowling ball, lining up his shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like Tiger before him, a young savior has come to raise a sport from the ashes. Rookie Hal Stewart, a young man with a dream, realizing that dream here today, folks. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One might click there heels and say "There's no place like home" upon finding themselves in such a fantasy. Well, Hal looks very much at home right were he is - with a ball in hand and glory in his sights. INT. METRO CITY LIBRARY - CONTINUOUS In the bowels of Master Mind's hideout, the HYDROGEN REACTOR glows and HUMS MENACINGLY. BACK TO SCENE Roxanne just stand helpless as Frank films away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hal, I know everyone treated you like shit, but you don't have to do this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. I don't HAVE to do anything. Isn't that cool? Titan lines up his shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here's one for the record books! Titan flies a few feet and rolls the ball down the main street. ROXANNE Her face is utter horror as she watches the inevitable destruction of Metro City. As the ball rolls - it demolishes everything in it's wake; cars, street lamps - windows shatter as the giant concrete sphere brushes along side buildings. TITAN He smiles in anticipation and uses "body English" to direct the ball. GIANT BOWLING BALL POV It's nearly halfway to its target. ROXANNE 111. She closes her eyes. Titan's smile fades. He looks around as if he hears something we don't. About two hundred feet in front of the first building a GIANT SPIDER WEB flies across the path of the ball, creating a defensive barrier. An enormous letter "M" is etched in the web's center.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the...? The ball breaks through the web, but it's speed is greatly reduced.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, what's that flying in the air? We suddenly see MASTER MIND FLYING OVER THE ROLLING BALL IN A JET PACK. He quickly pulls out his goo gun and starts laying down a path of sticky plasm to stop the destructive sphere's path.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, slow down Master Mind looks down to see the meter of the gun close to empty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon. The ball slows drastically then starts rolling to the side. It heads off an embankment and rolls harmlessly into a CANAL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gutterball! TITAN He's furious to say the least.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Master Mind gives him a mocking grin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bowling? What other trailer park sports can you play?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are becoming a real pain in my ass. I should have done this a long time ago. Titan lunges at his tormentor. Master Mind hits the BOOSTER on his jet pack and heads back toward the other side of the city with Titan in hot pursuit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plato, Da Vinci.   Secure Roxanne, he's falling for   it. ELSEWHERE A flustered Titan lands. He begins searching the city streets, but Master Mind is nowhere in sight. He turns upon hearing an EEKING sound to his left. Sitting on the ground is a CHIMPANZEE wearing a strange collar. It smiles at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell? From behind, Titan is immediately set upon by five more RADIO CONTROLLED APES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: GODAMNIT! The critters bite hop and hit Titan. As soon as he throws one off two more jump him. Titan breaks free and with his mighty breath blows them across the street into a fruit stand. With Titan out of their sight they begin to attack the fruit. MASTER MIND He's a block away frantically hitting his remote.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit! Stupid monkeys and their fruit. Titan flies away from the mad monkeys and lands to find Master Mind sitting on the ground wrapped in a long cape with only his head sticking out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No more games. Titan FIRES HIS LASER VISION AT MASTER MIND's CHEST. Master Mind pulls the cloak away to reveal a FIRE HYDRANT. Titan's EYE LASERS burn through the hydrant releasing a high pressure stream of water. Master Mind uses the last remote which dumps two tons of CEMENT mix into the truck. The crowd, police and news crews move in closer when Titan doesn't emerge. Master Mind drops his last remote and walks toward the truck cautiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could it really be that easy-- - BOOM - The back of the truck explodes, throwing dust and concrete everywhere. When the dust clears we see and enraged Titan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't think so. As the villain walks toward him, he pulls back his fist to give Master Mind the killing blow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you don't mind, I'm going to punch trough your face now. Preparing himself for the end, Master Mind shuts his eyes as a SUDDEN GUST OF WIND BEGINS TO PICK UP. AS Titan goes to strike, a BLURRY FIGURE RUNS IN AND SNATCHES MASTER MIND OUT OF THE AWAY. Stunned, Master Mind begins to feel around his body as if to make sure everything's still in place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm alive. He turns to see UBERMAN standing next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uberman?

direction.raw_text: What is a hero? Well, there are many different kinds.
